data.price: او هغوى چې وايي: زموږ ربه! موږ ته له خپلو مېرمنو او خېلخانو د سترګو يخوالى راكړه او موږ د متقيانو امامان وګرځوه.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعۡيُنٖ وَٱجۡعَلۡنَا لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā hab lanā min azwājinā wadhurriyyātinā qurrata aʿyunin wa-ij'ʿalnā lil'muttaqīna imāman

dua.name: Dua for Family Protection
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine blessings for family, requesting righteous and compassionate descendants.

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.
